Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Excuse me, Lieutenant Ray, We're docking at Side 7 now. Please report to the bridge at once.

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: Very well. Your name is <MainCharacter>, isn't it?

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: How long have you been in the military?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: 6 months, sir/6 months, sir/3 years, sir/2 years, sir

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: Once we mass-produce the Gundam, we'll be able to end the war without sending young men like you into battle.

Scripts.Speaker: Select2
Scripts.Content: Your son, sir?/Maybe your son. What's his name?

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: Yes. I hear there are boys his age fighting as guerrillas. Is that true?

Scripts.Speaker: Tem
Scripts.Content: His name is Amuro. I hear there are boys his age fighting as guerrillas. Is that true?

Scripts.Speaker: <MainCharacter>
Scripts.Content: Yes, I'm told that it happens.
